mapper.insert: insert into user (user_email, user_pass, user_name, user_nickname, user_hp, user_birth, user_addr, user_joinday) values (#{user_email}, #{user_pass}, #{user_name}, #{user_nickname}, #{user_hp}, #{user_birth}, #{user_addr}, now())
mapper.select: select count(*) from user where user_nickname=#{user_nickname}
